channel.title: A menu for spending something like pk points?
channel.description: ok for example you have some pk points, is there any way to talk to an npc and a menu shows up, and it shows you rewards you can get, by clicking on it and it costs pk points

item.title: A menu for spending something like pk points?
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

Well, as far as I got, I have only tried and successfully done it through quest tab and music box. To do that you would need the cases, not the sendQuests but the cases which activate the function.

Read full topic
item.source: A menu for spending something like pk points?

item.title: A menu for spending something like pk points?
item.dc:creator: @pregg pregg
item.description:
@pregg wrote:

Idk if what you want can be done but you could make commands saying that if they have said amount of pk points,then too add an item and delete pk points. thats what i do.

Read full topic
